passives.name: Between the Ribs
passives.effects: You can now identify the ''Weakpoints'' of nearby enemy champions, marked as an arc around them and pointing towards a specific direction. ''Weakpoints'' on targets take 4 seconds to become exposed and linger for {{fd|11.25}} seconds afterwards. Dealing damage while you are facing an exposed ''Weakpoint'' will consume it to deal {{as|'''bonus''' true damage}} equal to {{as|3%|hp}} {{as|(+ 3% per 100 AD)}} {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} {{as|of the target's '''maximum''' health}} and grant you {{as|{{pp|50 to 75|key=%}} '''bonus''' movement speed}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds. Once a target's ''Weakpoint'' is consumed or expires, you identify a new ''Weakpoint'' on them.
